attributes.action: Larger sentence for the death of children with no parole & no special treatment
attributes.additional_details: I am a mum of 2 boys and seeing these poor children suffer and there murders receiving light sentences and given special treatment is not fair. Those children suffered endless torture and pain so why can't there murderers suffer the same instead of having a tv or given parenting classes. These poor children didn't ask to be brought into this world to beaten , mistreated,  malnutrited and made to feel unloved.
attributes.background: I would like you to help achieve this and maybe just maybe so many children won't get killed and social workers need training and investigating to help save a childs life too.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Require sentences for child sexual offences be served consecutively: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601956

Mandatory Life Sentence For Child Sex Offences: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/589160

Make convicted sex offender and child abusers ineligible for early release: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602630

Increase sentences for abuse, neglect and murder of a child: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602482
